content: flower granny square 1 row chain 2 8 single_crochet in second stitch from hook join with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet 2 row ch3 1 double_crochet in same stitch as chain 3 * 2 double_crochet chain 3* 7 times more 8 double_crochet groups join with a sl st in top of chain-3 3 row slip_stitch to the first chain 5 single_crochet in each chain-3 all around join with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn 4 row new color - start in the second single_crochet in a flowerleaf * 1sc 3 single_crochet in next middle stitch of the flowerleaf 1 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet into one * join with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet 5 row chain 3 1dc 7 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet chain 3 1 treble_crochet i next stitch * 2 double_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet chain 3 1 treble_crochet in next stitch * join with a slip_stitch in top of chain-3 6 row 1 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch 10 single_crochet skip 1 stitch 5 single_crochet in chain-3 *skip 1 stitch 11 single_crochet skip 1 stitch 5 single_crochet in chain-3 * join with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn 7 row new color same as you started with - start in second stitch of one of the corners 1 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next stitch *15 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next stitch * end the row with 14 single_crochet join with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet 8 row 1 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 3sc in next stitch *17 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next stitch* end the row with 15 single_crochet join with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn fasten all ends pattern and images © silja-devine pattern republished 01 11 2007
